Headline: #76 Diversey Temporary Reroute at Diversey/LeClaire
ShortDescription: 76 Diversey buses are temporarily rerouted via Diversey, Laramie, Fullerton, Cicero,and Diversey due to, street blockage at Diversey/LeClaire.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#76 Diversey buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Diversey, Laramie, Fullerton, Cicero,and Diversey due to, street blockage at Diversey/LeClaire.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Illinois Medical District. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Illinois Medical District.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
